Anton Dvorson

Solution / Software Architect

Professional software architect with 10+ years of expertise in Node.js and React ecosystems, specializing in high-traffic e-commerce platforms and scalable cloud solutions. Proven track record in leading technical teams, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and deploying applications across AWS, Azure, and private cloud infrastructures.

Recent Experience

EPAM Systems

Solution Architect on KDI-HEAD

Project: E-commerce PWA Platform

2 years 5 months

Jan 2023 – Present

Spearheaded architecture and development of a high-performance Progressive Web Application leveraging Next.js and Magento's GraphQL API. Implemented server-side rendering, responsive design, and robust CI/CD pipelines for enterprise e-commerce standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Developed end-to-end solution architecture for complex enterprise requirements
  • Collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical specifications
  • Built and optimized CI/CD pipelines reducing time-to-market

Technologies:

Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, Apollo Client, Magento GraphQL, Material UI, Playwright, Redis, Azure, GitHub Actions, NewRelic

Liberty Global Services

Developer on LIBG-DAWN

Project: Multimedia Hub for Set Top Box

1 year 4 months

Sep 2021 – Dec 2022

Developed centralized household Multimedia Hub providing access to live broadcasting, VOD, recordings, and third-party applications with full interoperability between devices.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Developed EFL graphics components for UI display from Node.js on set top box hardware
  • Integrated and optimized UI functionalities on embedded Linux systems
  • Ensured seamless Node.js and EFL interaction for enhanced performance

Technologies:

Node.js, Embedded Linux, EFL, Prometheus, Grafana

FirstLine Software

Full-stack Developer, DevOps

Project: Heavy Equipment Marketplace (eqhq.com)

5 months

Feb 2021 – Jun 2021

Developed heavy equipment marketplace web application with advanced search, payment processing, and secure infrastructure for US-based customer.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Fixed GraphQL-based user location procedures and improved stepper UI components
  • Enhanced Elasticsearch suggestions with entity splitting and performance optimization
  • Improved email/chat notifications and order refund processes

Technologies:

Elasticsearch, GraphQL, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Docker, AWS, Redis, Material UI, Strapi, Stripe, Plaid, MongoDB
